parameters.name: EntityType
parameters.jsonData:
[
    { "value":"ip", "label":"Private IP Address" },
    { "value":"publicip", "label":"Public IP Address" },
    { "value":"host", "label":"Hostname" },
    { "value":"aduser", "label":"AD User" },
    { "value":"user", "label":"Email Account", "selected":true }
]

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.label: Client
parameters.query: resources | where type =~ 'Microsoft.operationsmanagement/solutions' | where name contains 'SecurityInsights' | project id = tostring(properties.workspaceResourceId)

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated >= {Timerange:start} and TimeGenerated <= {Timerange:end}
| search @'{Variable}'
| project AlertTime = TimeGenerated, 
          AlertName = DisplayName, 
          AlertDescription = Description
| order by AlertTime desc
content.title: SecurityAlert Involving Entity

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated >= {Timerange:start} and TimeGenerated <= {Timerange:end}
| search @"{Variable}"
| summarize count() by ProviderName
content.title: Security Alert Product Information

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated >= {Timerange:start} and TimeGenerated <= {Timerange:end}
| search @"{Variable}"
| summarize count() by Status
content.title: Security Alert Status

content.query:
IdentityInfo
| where TimeGenerated >= ago (30d)
| where AccountUPN =~ "{Variable}"
| take 1
| extend Location = strcat(
    iff(isempty(StreetAddress), '', strcat(StreetAddress, ', ')), 
    iff(isempty(City), '', strcat(City, ', ')), 
    iff(isempty(State), '', strcat(State)) 
)
| project AccountDisplayName, AccountCreationTime, Department, JobTitle, Location, Phone, Enabled = IsAccountEnabled
content.title: Identity Info via UPN

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where UserPrincipalName =~ '{Variable}'
| extend city_  = tostring(LocationDetails.city) 
| extend state_ = tostring(LocationDetails.state) 
| extend countryOrRegion_ = tostring(LocationDetails.countryOrRegion) 
| extend latitude_  = tostring(parse_json(tostring(LocationDetails.geoCoordinates)).latitude) 
| extend longitude_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(LocationDetails.geoCoordinates)).longitude)
content.title: IP Sign on Locations to Map

items.name: IP Sign on Locations to Map

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated >= {Timerange:start} and TimeGenerated <= {Timerange:end}
| where UserPrincipalName =~ '{Variable}'
| extend authenticationMethod_ = tostring(parse_json(AuthenticationDetails)[0].authenticationMethod)
| extend authenticationStepResultDetail_ = tostring(parse_json(AuthenticationDetails)[0].authenticationStepResultDetail)
| extend succeeded_ = tostring(parse_json(AuthenticationDetails)[0].succeeded)
| extend DeviceName = tostring(DeviceDetail.displayName)
| extend DeviceTrustType = tostring(DeviceDetail.trustType)
| extend operatingSystem_ = tostring(DeviceDetail.operatingSystem)
| extend city_ = tostring(LocationDetails.city)
| extend state_ = tostring(LocationDetails.state)
| extend countryOrRegion_ = tostring(LocationDetails.countryOrRegion)
| extend fullLocation = strcat(
    iff(isempty(city_), '', strcat(city_, ', ')), 
    iff(isempty(state_), '', strcat(state_, ', ')), 
    countryOrRegion_
)
| where succeeded_ == "true"
| summarize count() by fullLocation, IPAddress
| order by count_
content.title: Summarize signin locations for user

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated >= {Timerange:start} and TimeGenerated <= {Timerange:end}
| extend DeviceName = tostring(DeviceDetail.displayName)
| where UserPrincipalName =~ '{Variable}' and DeviceName != ""
| extend DeviceOS = tostring(DeviceDetail.operatingSystem)
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName, DeviceOS, AppDisplayName, IPAddress, RiskState
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Hosts a user has signed into

items.name: Hosts a user has signed into

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated >= {Timerange:start} and TimeGenerated <= {Timerange:end}
| where UserPrincipalName =~ '{Variable}'
| extend succeeded = tostring(parse_json(AuthenticationDetails)[0].succeeded)
| summarize EventCount = count() by ResultType, bin(TimeGenerated, 1m)
content.title: SignInLog Result Trend

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated >= {Timerange:start} and TimeGenerated <= {Timerange:end}
| where UserPrincipalName =~ '{Variable}'
| extend authenticationMethod_ = tostring(parse_json(AuthenticationDetails)[0].authenticationMethod)
| extend authenticationStepResultDetail_ = tostring(parse_json(AuthenticationDetails)[0].authenticationStepResultDetail)
| extend succeeded_ = tostring(parse_json(AuthenticationDetails)[0].succeeded)
| where (ResultType in ("0", "Success")) or (succeeded_ == "true")
| extend DeviceName = tostring(DeviceDetail.displayName)
| extend DeviceTrustType = tostring(DeviceDetail.trustType)
| extend operatingSystem_ = tostring(DeviceDetail.operatingSystem)
| extend city_ = tostring(LocationDetails.city)
| extend state_ = tostring(LocationDetails.state)
| extend countryOrRegion_ = tostring(LocationDetails.countryOrRegion)
| extend fullLocation = strcat(
    iff(isempty(city_), '', strcat(city_, ', ')), 
    iff(isempty(state_), '', strcat(state_, ', ')), 
    countryOrRegion_
)
| project TimeGenerated, IPAddress, ResultDescription, SourceSystem, AppDisplayName, authenticationMethod_, authenticationStepResultDetail_, succeeded_, ConditionalAccessStatus, DeviceName, DeviceTrustType, operatingSystem_, fullLocation, UserAgent, UserType
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Successful SignInLogs Activity

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated >= {Timerange:start} and TimeGenerated <= {Timerange:end}
| where UserPrincipalName =~'{Variable}'
| extend authenticationMethod_ = tostring(parse_json(AuthenticationDetails)[0].authenticationMethod)
| extend authenticationStepResultDetail_ = tostring(parse_json(AuthenticationDetails)[0].authenticationStepResultDetail)
| extend succeeded_ = tostring(parse_json(AuthenticationDetails)[0].succeeded)
| extend DeviceName = tostring(DeviceDetail.displayName)
| extend DeviceTrustType = tostring(DeviceDetail.trustType)
| extend operatingSystem_ = tostring(DeviceDetail.operatingSystem)
| extend city_ = tostring(LocationDetails.city)
| extend state_ = tostring(LocationDetails.state)
| extend countryOrRegion_ = tostring(LocationDetails.countryOrRegion)
| extend fullLocation = strcat(
    iff(isempty(city_), '', strcat(city_, ', ')), 
    iff(isempty(state_), '', strcat(state_, ', ')), 
    countryOrRegion_
)
| where succeeded_ == "false"
| project TimeGenerated, IPAddress, ResultDescription, SourceSystem, AppDisplayName, authenticationMethod_, authenticationStepResultDetail_, succeeded_, ConditionalAccessStatus, DeviceName, DeviceTrustType, operatingSystem_, fullLocation, UserAgent, UserType
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Failed SignInLogs Activity
BehaviorAnalytics User Info

content.query:
EmailEvents
| where TimeGenerated >= {Timerange:start} and TimeGenerated <= {Timerange:end}
| where RecipientEmailAddress =~ '{Variable}'
| project TimeGenerated, SenderFromAddress, Subject, AttachmentCount, UrlCount, DeliveryAction, EmailDirection, EmailLanguage
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Received Emails

content.query:
EmailEvents
| where TimeGenerated >= {Timerange:start} and TimeGenerated <= {Timerange:end}
| where SenderFromAddress=~ '{Variable}'
| project TimeGenerated, RecipientEmailAddress, Subject, AttachmentCount, UrlCount, DeliveryAction, EmailDirection, EmailLanguage
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Sent Emails

content.query:
EmailAttachmentInfo
| where TimeGenerated >= {Timerange:start} and TimeGenerated <= {Timerange:end}
| where SenderFromAddress =~ '{Variable}' or RecipientEmailAddress =~ '{Variable}'
| project TimeGenerated, FileName, FileType, RecipientEmailAddress, SenderFromAddress, SHA256, FileSize
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Attachment Info in emails

content.query:
EmailUrlInfo
| where TimeGenerated >= {Timerange:start} and TimeGenerated <= {Timerange:end}
| join kind=inner (
    EmailEvents
    | project SenderFromAddress, RecipientEmailAddress, NetworkMessageId
) on NetworkMessageId
| where SenderFromAddress =~ '{Variable}' or RecipientEmailAddress =~ '{Variable}'
| project TimeGenerated, Url, UrlLocation, Domain = UrlDomain, Sender = SenderFromAddress, Recipient = RecipientEmailAddress
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: URL Info in emails

content.query:
AuditLogs
| where OperationName has "Reset"
| extend ipAddress = tostring(parse_json(tostring(InitiatedBy.user)).ipAddress)
| extend Account = tostring(TargetResources[0].displayName), 
          InitiatingUser = tostring(InitiatedBy.user.userPrincipalName)
| where InitiatingUser =~ '{Variable}' or Account =~ '{Variable}'
| project TimeGenerated, Account, InitiatingUser, ResultDescription, ActivityDateTime, Location, ipAddress
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: AzureAD Password Resets

content.query:
Heartbeat
| where Computer == "{Variable}" or ComputerIP == "{Variable}" or ComputerPrivateIPs contains "{Variable}"
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, ComputerIP, OSType, OSName, RemoteIPCountry, ComputerPrivateIPs, ComputerEnvironment
| take 1
content.title: Heartbeat Host Details

content.query:
let searchvalue = "{Variable}";
DeviceNetworkEvents
| where DeviceName has '{Variable}'
| extend User = InitiatingProcessAccountUpn,
        File = InitiatingProcessFileName,
        ParentFile = InitiatingProcessParentFileName,
        Product = InitiatingProcessVersionInfoProductName,
        URL = RemoteUrl
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName, LocalIP, LocalPort, RemoteIP, RemotePort, User, File, ParentFile, Product, URL
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Recent Device Network Activity

content.query:
Syslog
| where Computer has '{Variable}'
| extend 
    SerialNumber = iff(SyslogMessage !contains "Fortigate", 
                       extract("sn=([\\w\\d]+)", 1, SyslogMessage), 
                       extract("deviceExternalId=([^ ]+)", 1, SyslogMessage)),
    Firewall = iff(SyslogMessage !contains "Fortigate", 
                   extract("fw=([\\d\\.]+)", 1, SyslogMessage), 
                   "Fortinet"), // Assuming 'Firewall' refers to the brand
    Priority = iff(SyslogMessage !contains "Fortigate", 
                   extract("pri=(\\d+)", 1, SyslogMessage), 
                   extract("FTNTFGTlevel=([^ ]+)", 1, SyslogMessage)),
    Message = iff(SyslogMessage !contains "Fortigate", 
                  extract('msg=\"([^\"]+)\"', 1, SyslogMessage), 
                  extract("msg=([^ ]+)", 1, SyslogMessage)),
    SrcMac = iff(SyslogMessage !contains "Fortigate", 
                 extract("srcMac=([\\w\\d:]+)", 1, SyslogMessage), 
                 ""), // Placeholder as MAC isn't directly in Fortinet log
    SrcIP = iff(SyslogMessage !contains "Fortigate", 
                extract("src=([\\d\\.]+):", 1, SyslogMessage), 
                extract("src=([^ ]+)", 1, SyslogMessage)),
    SrcPort = iff(SyslogMessage !contains "Fortigate", 
                  extract("src=[\\d\\.]+:(\\d+)", 1, SyslogMessage), 
                  extract("spt=([^ ]+)", 1, SyslogMessage)),
    NatSrc = iff(SyslogMessage !contains "Fortigate", 
                 extract("natSrc=([\\d\\.]+)", 1, SyslogMessage), 
                 ""), // Placeholder as NAT source isn't directly in Fortinet log
    DstMac = iff(SyslogMessage !contains "Fortigate", 
                 extract("dstMac=([\\w\\d:]+)", 1, SyslogMessage), 
                 ""), // Placeholder as MAC isn't directly in Fortinet log
    DstIP = iff(SyslogMessage !contains "Fortigate", 
                extract("dst=([\\d\\.]+):", 1, SyslogMessage), 
                extract("dst=([^ ]+)", 1, SyslogMessage)),
    DstPort = iff(SyslogMessage !contains "Fortigate", 
                  extract("dst=[\\d\\.]+:(\\d+)", 1, SyslogMessage), 
                  extract("dpt=([^ ]+)", 1, SyslogMessage)),
    Protocol = iff(SyslogMessage !contains "Fortigate", 
                   extract("proto=([\\w\\d]+)\\/", 1, SyslogMessage), 
                   extract("proto=([^ ]+)", 1, SyslogMessage)),
    Application = iff(SyslogMessage !contains "Fortigate", 
                      extract("proto=[\\w\\d]+\\/([a-zA-Z]+)", 1, SyslogMessage), 
                      extract("app=([^ ]+)", 1, SyslogMessage)),
    Category = iff(SyslogMessage !contains "Fortigate", 
                   extract('Category=\"([^\"]+)\"', 1, SyslogMessage), 
                   extract("cat=([^ ]+)", 1, SyslogMessage)),
    FirewallAction = iff(SyslogMessage !contains "Fortigate", 
                         extract('fw_action=\"([^\"]+)\"', 1, SyslogMessage), 
                         extract("act=([^ ]+)", 1, SyslogMessage)),
    Code = iff(SyslogMessage !contains "Fortigate", 
               extract("code=(\\d+)", 1, SyslogMessage), 
               ""), // Placeholder as Code isn't directly in Fortinet log
    URL = iff(SyslogMessage !contains "Fortigate", 
              "", // Placeholder as URL extraction depends on the non-Fortinet log format
              extract("request=([^ ]+)", 1, SyslogMessage))
| extend Pack=pack_all()
| extend TimeFromNow = now() - TimeGenerated
| extend TimeAgo = strcat(case(TimeFromNow < 2m, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1m), ' seconds'), TimeFromNow < 2h, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1m), ' minutes'), TimeFromNow < 2d, strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1h), ' hours'), strcat(toint(TimeFromNow / 1d), ' days')), ' ago') 
| project ["Time"]=strcat('ğŸ•’', TimeAgo), TimeGenerated, Firewall = HostName, SeverityLevel, ["Details"]=Pack, SrcIP, SrcPort, DstIP, DstPort, Application, FirewallAction, URL, Category
content.title: SysLog Table

content.query:
let searchvalue = "{Variable}";
DeviceNetworkEvents
| where TimeGenerated >= {Timerange:start} and TimeGenerated <= {Timerange:end}
| where DeviceName has '{Variable}' and RemoteIPType == "Public"
| where RemoteUrl !in ("") and (RemoteUrl !contains "windows") and (RemoteUrl !contains "update") and (RemoteUrl !contains "office") and (RemoteUrl !contains "qarbon") and (RemoteUrl !contains "live") and (RemoteUrl !contains "microsoft") and (RemoteUrl !contains "google") and (RemoteUrl !contains "skype") and (RemoteUrl !contains "digicert") and (RemoteUrl !contains "azure") and (RemoteUrl !contains "bing") and (RemoteUrl !contains "live") and (RemoteUrl !contains "lenovo") and (RemoteUrl !contains "adobe") and (RemoteUrl !contains "msn") and (RemoteUrl !contains "oneclient") and (RemoteUrl !contains "gcp") and (RemoteUrl !contains "onenote") and (RemoteUrl !contains "oracle") and (RemoteUrl !contains "paloaltonetworks") 
| summarize ConnectionCount = count() by RemoteIP, RemotePort
| order by ConnectionCount desc
content.title: Connections to Public IPs- Filtered

content.query:
let searchvalue = "{Variable}";
DeviceNetworkEvents
| where TimeGenerated >= {Timerange:start} and TimeGenerated <= {Timerange:end}
| where DeviceName has '{Variable}' and RemoteIPType == "Public"
| where RemoteUrl != ""
| where RemoteUrl !in ("") and (RemoteUrl !contains "windows") and (RemoteUrl !contains "update") and (RemoteUrl !contains "office") and (RemoteUrl !contains "qarbon") and (RemoteUrl !contains "live") and (RemoteUrl !contains "microsoft") and (RemoteUrl !contains "google") and (RemoteUrl !contains "skype") and (RemoteUrl !contains "digicert") and (RemoteUrl !contains "azure") and (RemoteUrl !contains "bing") and (RemoteUrl !contains "live") and (RemoteUrl !contains "lenovo") and (RemoteUrl !contains "adobe") and (RemoteUrl !contains "msn") and (RemoteUrl !contains "oneclient") and (RemoteUrl !contains "gcp") and (RemoteUrl !contains "onenote") and (RemoteUrl !contains "oracle") and (RemoteUrl !contains "paloaltonetworks") 
| summarize URLCount = count() by RemoteUrl
| order by URLCount desc
content.title: Top URL Vists - Filtered

content.query:
let HostnameParam = @'{Variable}';
DeviceFileEvents
| where DeviceName contains HostnameParam
| where ActionType == "FileCreated"
| where (FileName !contains "PSScriptPolicyTest") and (FileName !startswith "edr") and (FileName !contains "autod") and (FileName != "Report.wer")
| where InitiatingProcessAccountName !in ("himds", "network service", "system")
| project TimeGenerated, FileName, FolderPath, FileSize, InitiatingProcessAccountName, InitiatingProcessFolderPath, SHA256
content.title: File Creation events

content.query:
let HostnameParam = '{Variable}';
DeviceInfo
| where TimeGenerated >= {Timerange:start} and TimeGenerated <= {Timerange:end}
| where DeviceName has HostnameParam
| where LoggedOnUsers <> "[]"
| extend UserName = tostring(LoggedOnUsers[0].UserName)
| summarize EventCount = count() by UserName, DeviceName
| order by EventCount desc
content.title: Common Users via DeviceInfo

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID in ("1149", "21", "22", "24", "40", "4779", "39", "9009") 
    or (EventID in ("4624", "4625", "4634") and LogonType == "10")
    and Computer contains @'{Variable}'
| project TimeGenerated, Account, Computer, Activity, IpAddress, ProcessId, SubjectAccount, TargetUserName
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: RDP Activity

content.query:
let HostnameParam = '{Variable}';
SecurityEvent
| where TimeGenerated >= {Timerange:start} and TimeGenerated <= {Timerange:end}
| where EventID in (4624, 4625) // 4624 for successful logon, 4625 for logon failure
| where Computer has HostnameParam // Filter events for the specific hostname
| summarize count() by Account, AccountType, LogonType, IpAddress, WorkstationName, Status, EventID, FailureReason
| order by count_ desc
content.title: SysLog signins to host

content.query:
let HostnameParam = @'{Variable}';
DeviceProcessEvents
| where DeviceName contains HostnameParam
| project TimeGenerated, AccountName, AccountUpn, FileName, FolderPath, ProcessCommandLine, PID = InitiatingProcessId, MD5 = InitiatingProcessMD5, ParentProcess = InitiatingProcessParentFileName, Product = ProcessVersionInfoProductName
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Device Process Events

content.query:
let HostnameParam = @'{Variable}';
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where DeviceName contains HostnameParam
| project TimeGenerated, ActionType, UPN = InitiatingProcessAccountUpn, RegistryKey, PrevValue = PreviousRegistryValueData, PrevValueName = PreviousRegistryValueName, NewValue = RegistryValueData, NewValueName = RegistryValueName, Type = RegistryValueType, File = InitiatingProcessFileName, CommandLine = InitiatingProcessCommandLine
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Device Registry Events

content.query:
let HostnameParam = @'{Variable}';
let ProcessPath = (InputTable: (Key: string)) {
    InputTable
    | extend Splitted_Key = split(Key, '\\')
    | mv-expand idx = range(0, array_length(Splitted_Key) - 1, 1) to typeof(int)
    | extend Paths = iif(idx == 0, Splitted_Key[0], strcat(Splitted_Key[0], '\\', strcat_array(array_slice(Splitted_Key, 1, idx), '\\')))
    | summarize by Paths
    | extend Node_Order = split(Paths, "\\")
    | extend Family_Length = array_length(Node_Order)
    | order by Family_Length asc
    | extend Current_Parent_Path = strcat_array(array_slice(Node_Order, 0, -2), "\\")
    | where Paths != ""
    | extend Index = row_number()
    | project Paths, Current_Parent_Path, Index
};
let paths = DeviceFileEvents
    | where DeviceName == @'{Variable}'
    | distinct FolderPath
    | project Key = FolderPath;
ProcessPath(paths)
| join kind=leftouter ProcessPath(paths) on $left.Current_Parent_Path == $right.Paths
| extend Single_Folders = split(Paths, "\\")[-1]
| project Single_Folders, Child_Index = Index1, Parent_Index = Index
content.title: File Structure of Changed Files - DeviceFileEvents

content.query:
OfficeActivity
| where TimeGenerated >= {Timerange:start} and TimeGenerated <= {Timerange:end}
| where ClientIP == '{Variable}'
| lookup kind=leftouter (SigninLogs
    | extend city_ = tostring(LocationDetails.city)
    | extend state_ = tostring(LocationDetails.state)
    | extend countryOrRegion_ = tostring(LocationDetails.countryOrRegion)
    | project SignIn_IPAddress = IPAddress, city_, state_, countryOrRegion_)
  on $left.ClientIP == $right.SignIn_IPAddress
| summarize ActivityCount = count() by UserId, Operation, UserAgent, city_, state_, countryOrRegion_, ClientIP
| order by ActivityCount asc
content.title: Uncommon Office 365 Activity from IP

content.query:
OfficeActivity
| where TimeGenerated >= {Timerange:start} and TimeGenerated <= {Timerange:end}
| where ClientIP == '{Variable}'
| lookup kind=leftouter (SigninLogs
    | extend city_ = tostring(LocationDetails.city)
    | extend state_ = tostring(LocationDetails.state)
    | extend countryOrRegion_ = tostring(LocationDetails.countryOrRegion)
    | project SignIn_IPAddress = IPAddress, city_, state_, countryOrRegion_)
  on $left.ClientIP == $right.SignIn_IPAddress
| project TimeGenerated, UserId, Operation, UserAgent, city_, state_, countryOrRegion_, ClientIP
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Recent Office 365 Activity from IP

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated >= {Timerange:start} and TimeGenerated <= {Timerange:end}
| where IPAddress == '{Variable}'
| extend city_ = tostring(LocationDetails.city), 
        state_ = tostring(LocationDetails.state), 
        countryOrRegion_ = tostring(LocationDetails.countryOrRegion),
        OS = tostring(DeviceDetail.operatingSystem),
        DeviceName = tostring(DeviceDetail.displayName)
| extend DeviceName = tostring(DeviceDetail.displayName)
| summarize Count = count() by ResultType, ResultDescription, city_, state_, countryOrRegion_,
        UserPrincipalName, 
        ResourceDisplayName, 
        DeviceName,
        OS,
        ConditionalAccessStatus,
        TokenIssuerType
| order by Count desc
content.title: Common Azure SignIn Activity

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated >= {Timerange:start} and TimeGenerated <= {Timerange:end}
| where IPAddress == '{Variable}'
| extend city_ = tostring(LocationDetails.city), 
        state_ = tostring(LocationDetails.state), 
        countryOrRegion_ = tostring(LocationDetails.countryOrRegion),
        OS = tostring(DeviceDetail.operatingSystem),
        DeviceName = tostring(DeviceDetail.displayName)
| extend DeviceName = tostring(DeviceDetail.displayName)
| project TimeGenerated, ResultType, ResultDescription, city_, state_, countryOrRegion_,
        UserPrincipalName, 
        ResourceDisplayName, 
        DeviceName,
        OS,
        ConditionalAccessStatus,
        TokenIssuerType
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Recent Azure SignIn Activity

content.query:
AzureActivity
| search "{Variable}"
| extend ActionPath = tostring(parse_json(Properties).message)
| extend SourceResource = tostring(parse_json(Properties).resource)
| extend AuthroizedRole = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Authorization).evidence)).role)
| project TimeGenerated, CallerIpAddress, ActivityStatusValue, ResourceGroup, ActionPath, SourceResource, AuthroizedRole
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: AzureActivity from IP

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| search @'{Variable}'
| where EventID in ("1149", "21", "22", "24", "40", "4779", "39", "9009") 
    or (EventID in ("4624", "4625", "4634") and LogonType == "10")
| project TimeGenerated, Account, Computer, Activity, IpAddress, ProcessId, SubjectAccount, TargetUserName
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: RDP Activity

content.query:
let searchvalue = "{Variable}";
ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| where isnotempty(searchvalue)
| where NetworkIP contains_cs "{Variable}"
content.title: IP Threat Intelligence Lookup

content.query:
{"version":"AzureDataExplorerQuery/1.0","queryText":"SigninLogs
| where IPAddress == "{Variable}"
| extend Geo = parse_json(tostring(parse_json(LocationDetails)['geoCoordinates']))
| extend Latitude = toreal((tostring(parse_json(Geo)['latitude'])))
| extend Longitude = toreal(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Geo)['longitude'])))
| summarize Count = count() by Longitude, Latitude, IPAddress
| project Longitude, Latitude, Count, IPAddress
| render scatterchart with (kind=map)","clusterName":"ibwcsoc2131cluster.southcentralus","databaseName":"M2131"}
content.title: IP Location - PublicIP

content.query:
let ip_address = '{Variable}';
// Collecting security events related to the IP address within the specified time range
SecurityEvent
| where TimeGenerated >= {Timerange:start} and TimeGenerated <= {Timerange:end}
| where IpAddress == ip_address
| where EventID in (4624, // An account was successfully logged on
                    4625, // An account failed to log on
                    4648, // A logon was attempted using explicit credentials
                    4672) // Special privileges assigned to new logon
| summarize Count = count() by Account, Computer, EventID, Activity, LogonType
| order by Count desc
content.title: Common Syslog Logon Events - PrivateIP

content.query:
let ip_address = '{Variable}';
SecurityEvent
| where TimeGenerated >= {Timerange:start} and TimeGenerated <= {Timerange:end}
| where EventID == 4624 // An account was successfully logged on
| where IpAddress == ip_address
| summarize HostLogonCount = count() by Computer
| order by HostLogonCount desc
content.title: Most Common Hosts - Windows Events

content.query:
let ip_address = '{Variable}';
SecurityEvent
| where TimeGenerated >= {Timerange:start} and TimeGenerated <= {Timerange:end}
| where EventID == 4624 // An account was successfully logged on
| where IpAddress == ip_address
| summarize UserHostLogonCount = count() by TargetUserName, Computer
| top 5 by UserHostLogonCount desc
content.title: Users Logged Into Specific Hosts - Windows Events

items.name: Users Logged Into Specific Hosts - Windows Events

content.query:
let DeviceNameFromIP = Heartbeat
| where ComputerPrivateIPs has "{Variable}" 
| extend DeviceName = tostring(split(Computer, ".")[0])
| summarize by DeviceName; 
SigninLogs
| where ResultType == "0"
| extend DeviceName = tostring(DeviceDetail.displayName)
| join kind=inner DeviceNameFromIP on DeviceName 
| extend city_ = tostring(LocationDetails.city)
| extend state_ = tostring(LocationDetails.state)
| extend countryOrRegion_ = tostring(LocationDetails.countryOrRegion)
| extend fullLocation = strcat(
    iff(isempty(city_), '', strcat(city_, ', ')), 
    iff(isempty(state_), '', strcat(state_, ', ')), 
    countryOrRegion_)
| project TimeGenerated, DeviceName, UserPrincipalName, UserDisplayName, fullLocation, AppDisplayName, IPAddress, UserAgent
content.title: SignInLogs Events from Associated Host

content.query:
Heartbeat
| where ComputerPrivateIPs contains "{Variable}"
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, ComputerIP, OSType, OSName, RemoteIPCountry, ComputerPrivateIPs, ComputerEnvironment
| take 1
content.title: Heartbeat Device Info

content.query:
let ip_address = '{Variable}';
DeviceNetworkEvents
| where TimeGenerated >= {Timerange:start} and TimeGenerated <= {Timerange:end}
| where LocalIP == ip_address or RemoteIP == ip_address
//| where ActionType !contains "inspected"
| extend Protocol = case(
    ActionType contains "HTTP", "HTTP",
    ActionType contains "Https", "HTTPS",
    ActionType contains "DNS", "DNS",
    ActionType contains "ssh", "SSH",
    ActionType contains "rdp", "RDP",
    ActionType contains "ftp", "FTP",
    "Other"
)
| project-reorder TimeGenerated, 
          LocalIP, 
          RemoteIP, 
          Protocol, 
          ActionType,
          LocalPort, 
          RemotePort, 
          InitiatingProcessCommandLine
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Host Network Connections

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where EventID in ("1149", "21", "22", "24", "40", "4779", "39", "9009") 
    or (EventID in ("4624", "4625", "4634") and LogonType == "10")
    and IpAddress == "{Variable}"
| project TimeGenerated, Account, Computer, Activity, IpAddress, ProcessId, SubjectAccount, TargetUserName
content.title: RDP Activity
Syslog FW Connection Events

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where TimeGenerated >= {Timerange:start} and TimeGenerated <= {Timerange:end}
| search @'{Variable}'
| project-away $table, TenantId, SourceSystem, EventSourceName, Channel, Task, Level, EventData
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: SecurityEvent Table

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Account contains @'{Variable}'
| where EventID in (4727, 4728, 4729, 4730, 4731, 4732, 4733, 4734, 4735, 4737, 4754, 4755, 4756, 4757, 4758, 4759)
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, TargetUserName, SubjectUserName, MemberSid
content.title: Security Group Management

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Account contains @'{Variable}'
| where EventID in (4720, 4722, 4725, 4726, 4738)
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, TargetUserName, SubjectUserName, Activity
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: User Account Changes (Creation, Deletion, Modification)

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Account contains @'{Variable}'
| where EventID == 4688 and NewProcessName contains "powershell"
| project-reorder TimeGenerated, Computer, CommandLine
content.title: Powershell usage

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Account contains @'{Variable}'
| where EventID in ("1149", "21", "22", "24", "40", "4779", "39", "9009") 
    or (EventID in ("4624", "4625", "4634") and LogonType == "10")
| project TimeGenerated, Account, Computer, Activity, IpAddress, ProcessId, SubjectAccount, TargetUserName
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: RDP Activity

content.query:
let suspiciousAccount = @'{Variable}';
let AllEvents = SecurityEvent
    | where Account contains suspiciousAccount and EventID in (4624, 4634, 4672)
    | where LogonType in ("2", "10", "11", "12")
    | extend LogonId = coalesce(TargetLogonId, SubjectLogonId)
    | join kind=leftouter (
        SecurityEvent
        | where EventID == "4672"
        | project EventID, LogonId = SubjectLogonId
    ) on LogonId
    | extend EventType = case(EventID1 == 4672, "SpecialLogon", EventID == 4624, "Logon", EventID == 4634, "Logoff", "Other")
    | project TimeGenerated, Account, LogonId, EventType, Computer, LogonType;
AllEvents
| summarize
    MinTime=min(TimeGenerated),
    MaxTime=max(TimeGenerated),
    SpecialLogonOccurred=any(EventType == "SpecialLogon")
    by LogonId, Account, Computer, LogonType
| extend SessionLengthSeconds = datetime_diff('second', MaxTime, MinTime)
| extend Days = toint(SessionLengthSeconds / 86400)
| extend Hours = toint((SessionLengthSeconds % 86400) / 3600)
| extend Minutes = toint((SessionLengthSeconds % 3600) / 60)
| extend Seconds = SessionLengthSeconds % 60
| extend SessionLengthFormatted = strcat(
                                      tostring(Days),
                                      "d:",
                                      iff(Hours < 10, strcat("0", tostring(Hours)), tostring(Hours)),
                                      "h:",
                                      iff(Minutes < 10, strcat("0", tostring(Minutes)), tostring(Minutes)),
                                      "m:",
                                      iff(Seconds < 10, strcat("0", tostring(Seconds)), tostring(Seconds)),
                                      "s"
                                  )
| where SessionLengthSeconds > 1 // Filter out any short sessions
| project
    Account,
    SessionStart = MinTime,
    SessionEnd = MaxTime,
    SessionLengthFormatted,
    SpecialLogonOccurred,
    Computer,
    LogonType,
    LogonId
content.title: Windows Event User Sessions

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Account contains @'{Variable}'
| where EventID in ("4624")
| project TimeGenerated, Account, IpAddress, LogonTypeName, Computer, Activity
| join kind=inner (
    Heartbeat
    | extend IpAddress = tostring(ComputerPrivateIPs[0])
    | project OSName, ComputerEnvironment, IpAddress
) on IpAddress
| project-away IpAddress1
| summarize Count = count() by Computer, IpAddress, Account
| order by Count desc
content.title: Unique Hosts Successfully Logged Into

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Account contains @'{Variable}'
| where EventID in ("4625", "4771", "4776")
content.title: Failed Logon Activity

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where Account contains @'{Variable}'
| where EventID == "4624"
| project TimeGenerated, IpAddress, LogonType, Computer
| join kind=leftouter (
    Heartbeat
    | extend IpAddress = tostring(ComputerPrivateIPs[0])
    | project OSName, ComputerEnvironment, IpAddress
) on IpAddress
| project-away IpAddress1
content.title: Successful Logon Activity

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where TargetAccount contains @'{Variable}'
| where EventID in ("4723", "4724")
| project TimeGenerated, SourceAccount = Account, Computer, TargetAccount, Activity
content.title: Windows Password Resets

content.query:
union *
| search @"{Variable}" 
| summarize  count1 = count() by Type
| order by count1 desc
content.title: Events per Table

content.query:
let TimeInterval = 1h; // Adjust the time interval as necessary
union *
| where TimeGenerated between ({Timerange:start} .. {Timerange:end})
| search @'{Variable}'
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, TimeInterval)
| union (
    range TimeGenerated from {Timerange:start} to {Timerange:end} step TimeInterval
    | extend Count = 0 // This creates the zero-value rows for dates without any logs
)
| summarize EventCount = sum(Count) by bin(TimeGenerated, TimeInterval)
| render timechart
content.title: Log Source Count - 1 Hour Increments

content.query:
SecurityEvent
| where TimeGenerated >= {Timerange:start} and TimeGenerated <= {Timerange:end}
| search @"{Variable}" 
| summarize count() by EventID, Activity
content.title: Windows Event Log Graph
